wikipedia_page.main: Nicholas Jacob Tregurtha (14 Dec 1884 – 14 May 1964) was a British rugby union player who competed in the 1908 Summer Olympics. He was born in St.Ives, Cornwall, United Kingdom. He died in 1964 in Bodmin, Cornwall. He was a member of the British rugby union team, which won the silver medal.
